statements: SELECT * FROM medications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT medication_name FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE batch_number LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT id, medication_name FROM medications WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM medications;
SELECT id, medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM medications ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM medications;
SELECT MAX(batch_number) FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT MIN(expiration_date) FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT id, medication_name FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2023-06-30';
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE batch_number IN ('XYZ123', 'DEF456');
SELECT id, COUNT(*) FROM medications GROUP BY id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT batch_number) FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT id, medication_name FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE batch_number LIKE '%ABC%';
SELECT id, medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, medication_name FROM medications WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_medications FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS total_batches FROM medications GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT * FROM medications ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM medications;
SELECT MAX(expiration_date) AS latest_expiration_date FROM medications;
SELECT MIN(expiration_date) AS earliest_expiration_date FROM medications WHERE medication_name = 'Paracetamol';
SELECT id, medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE batch_number IN ('001', '002', '003');
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), expiration_date)) AS avg_days_to_expire FROM medications;
SELECT id, medication_name, DATEDIFF(expiration_date, CURDATE()) AS days_to_expire FROM medications WHERE DATEDIFF(expiration_date, CURDATE()) <= 30;
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS total_expired_medications FROM medications WHERE expiration_date < CURDATE();
SELECT id, medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE medication_name LIKE '%in%';
SELECT id, medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE YEAR(expiration_date) = 2023;
SELECT id, medication_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM expiration_date) AS expiration_month FROM medications ORDER BY expiration_month;
SELECT id, medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, name FROM medications WHERE name LIKE 'Aspirin%';
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT inventory_id, quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT medications.name, inventory.quantity FROM medications JOIN inventory ON medications.id = inventory.medication_id;
SELECT medications.name, inventory.expiry_date FROM medications JOIN inventory ON medications.id = inventory.medication_id WHERE inventory.expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, name, batch_number FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM medications ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT * FROM medications ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT medications.name, inventory.quantity FROM medications INNER JOIN inventory ON medications.id = inventory.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM medications;
SELECT medications.name, COUNT(*) AS total FROM medications JOIN inventory ON medications.id = inventory.medication_id GROUP BY medications.name;
SELECT medications.name, SUM(inventory.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM medications JOIN inventory ON medications.id = inventory.medication_id GROUP BY medications.name;
SELECT medications.name, MAX(inventory.quantity) AS max_quantity FROM medications JOIN inventory ON medications.id = inventory.medication_id GROUP BY medications.name;
SELECT medications.name, AVG(inventory.quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM medications JOIN inventory ON medications.id = inventory.medication_id GROUP BY medications.name;
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE name LIKE '%aspirin%';
SELECT m.name AS medication_name, i.quantity AS available_quantity FROM medications m JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT m.name, i.quantity, i.expiry_date FROM medications m JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id WHERE i.expiry_date < CURDATE();
SELECT m.name, i.quantity, i.expiry_date FROM medications m JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id ORDER BY i.expiry_date DESC;
SELECT m.name, COUNT(i.inventory_id) AS total_entries FROM medications m JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id GROUP BY m.name;
SELECT m.name, MAX(i.quantity) AS max_quantity FROM medications m JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id GROUP BY m.name;
SELECT m.name AS medication_name, count(*) AS total_entries FROM medications m, inventory i WHERE m.id = i.medication_id GROUP BY m.name;
SELECT m.name, i.quantity FROM medications m LEFT JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id;
SELECT m.name AS medication_name, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM medications m JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id WHERE i.expiry_date > CURDATE() GROUP BY m.name;
SELECT m.name, IFNULL(i.quantity, 0) AS available_quantity FROM medications m LEFT JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id;
SELECT m.name AS medication_name, DATEDIFF(expiration_date, CURDATE()) AS days_until_expiration FROM medications m;
SELECT m.name, i.quantity, DATEDIFF(i.expiry_date, CURDATE()) AS days_until_expiry FROM medications m JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id;
SELECT m.name, i.quantity, IF(DATEDIFF(i.expiry_date, CURDATE()) < 30, 'Expires soon', 'Expires late') AS expiry_status FROM medications m JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id;
SELECT m.name, i.quantity, i.expiry_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, CURDATE(), i.expiry_date) AS months_until_expiry FROM medications m JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id;
SELECT m.name, AVG(i.quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM medications m JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id GROUP BY m.name;
SELECT m.name, COUNT(*) AS total_entries, SUM(i.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM medications m JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id GROUP BY m.name;
SELECT m.name, COUNT(*) AS total_entries, SUM(i.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM medications m LEFT JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id GROUP BY m.name;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM medications;
SELECT batch_number FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM batches;
SELECT production_date FROM batches WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT quantity FROM batches WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT quantity FROM inventory WHERE batch_id = 5;
SELECT batch_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT m.name, b.quantity FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id;
SELECT m.name, i.quantity FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id JOIN inventory i ON b.batch_id = i.batch_id;
SELECT m.name AS medication_name, b.quantity AS batch_quantity FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id WHERE b.quantity > 50;

SELECT i.inventory_id, m.name AS medication_name, b.quantity AS batch_quantity FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id JOIN inventory i ON b.batch_id = i.batch_id WHERE i.quantity > 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_medications FROM medications;
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS avg_batch_quantity FROM batches;
SELECT MIN(quantity) AS min_batch_quantity, MAX(quantity) AS max_batch_quantity FROM batches;
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM medications;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT m.name, COUNT(i.inventory_id) AS total_inventory FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id JOIN inventory i ON b.batch_id = i.batch_id GROUP BY m.name;
SELECT m.name, SUM(i.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id JOIN inventory i ON b.batch_id = i.batch_id GROUP BY m.name HAVING SUM(i.quantity) > 100;
SELECT m.name, DATE_FORMAT(b.production_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM batches;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT m.name, b.quantity FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id;
SELECT m.name, i.quantity FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id JOIN inventory i ON b.batch_id = i.batch_id;
SELECT m.name, b.quantity, b.production_date FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id WHERE b.production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT m.name, i.quantity, b.production_date FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id JOIN inventory i ON b.batch_id = i.batch_id WHERE i.quantity > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_medications FROM medications;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM batches;
SELECT MAX(production_date) AS latest_production_date FROM batches;
SELECT m.name, SUM(i.quantity) AS total_inventory FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id JOIN inventory i ON b.batch_id = i.batch_id GROUP BY m.name;
SELECT m.name, COUNT(*) AS total_batches FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id GROUP BY m.name;
SELECT m.name, AVG(b.quantity) AS average_quantity FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id GROUP BY m.name;
SELECT m.name, b.batch_id, b.quantity FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id ORDER BY b.quantity DESC;
SELECT m.name, b.quantity, i.quantity FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id JOIN inventory i ON b.batch_id = i.batch_id WHERE i.quantity < b.quantity;
SELECT m.name, b.quantity, b.production_date FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id WHERE b.production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT m.name, b.quantity, b.production_date FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id WHERE b.production_date < '2022-01-01' OR b.production_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT m.name, i.quantity FROM medications m LEFT JOIN inventory i ON m.id = i.batch_id;
SELECT m.name, b.quantity FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id WHERE b.quantity < (SELECT AVG(quantity) FROM batches);
SELECT m.name, b.production_date FROM medications m JOIN batches b ON m.id = b.medication_id GROUP BY m.name HAVING MAX(b.production_date) > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT medication_id, quantity FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT * FROM medication_batches;
SELECT medication_id, expiration_date FROM medication_batches;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, address FROM locations;
SELECT medications.name, medication_batches.batch_number FROM medications JOIN medication_batches ON medications.id = medication_batches.medication_id;
SELECT medications.name, medication_batches.expiration_date FROM medications JOIN medication_batches ON medications.id = medication_batches.medication_id;
SELECT medications.name, medication_batches.batch_number, medication_batches.expiration_date FROM medications JOIN medication_batches ON medications.id = medication_batches.medication_id;

SELECT medications.name, medication_batches.batch_number, medication_batches.expiration_date, medication_batches.quantity FROM medications JOIN medication_batches ON medications.id = medication_batches.medication_id;

SELECT medications.name, medication_batches.expiration_date, medication_batches.quantity, locations.name AS location_name FROM medications JOIN medication_batches ON medications.id = medication_batches.medication_id JOIN locations ON locations.id = medication_batches.location;

SELECT medications.name, medication_inventory.quantity, locations.name AS location_name FROM medications JOIN medication_inventory ON medications.id = medication_inventory.medication_id JOIN locations ON locations.id = medication_inventory.location;

SELECT medications.name, medication_inventory.quantity, medication_batches.batch_number, locations.name AS location_name FROM medications JOIN medication_inventory ON medications.id = medication_inventory.medication_id JOIN medication_batches ON medications.id = medication_batches.medication_id JOIN locations ON locations.id = medication_inventory.location;

SELECT locations.name, COUNT(medications.id) AS total_medications FROM locations LEFT JOIN medication_inventory ON locations.id = medication_inventory.location LEFT JOIN medications ON medications.id = medication_inventory.medication_id GROUP BY locations.id;
SELECT locations.name, SUM(medication_inventory.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM locations LEFT JOIN medication_inventory ON locations.id = medication_inventory.location GROUP BY locations.id;

SELECT medications.name, COUNT(medication_inventory.id) AS total_inventory_count FROM medications LEFT JOIN medication_inventory ON medications.id = medication_inventory.medication_id GROUP BY medications.id;

SELECT medications.name, MAX(medication_inventory.quantity) AS max_quantity FROM medications LEFT JOIN medication_inventory ON medications.id = medication_inventory.medication_id GROUP BY medications.id;
SELECT * FROM medications
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM medications
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT id, name FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT m.name, mi.quantity FROM medications m JOIN medication_inventory mi ON m.id = mi.medication_id
SELECT m.name, mb.expiration_date, mb.quantity FROM medications m JOIN medication_batches mb ON m.id = mb.medication_id
SELECT m.name, mi.location FROM medications m JOIN medication_inventory mi ON m.id = mi.medication_id WHERE mi.quantity >= 10
SELECT m.name AS medication_name, mb.batch_number, mb.quantity FROM medications m JOIN medication_batches mb ON m.id = mb.medication_id ORDER BY mb.quantity DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM medication_inventory
SELECT m.name, mi.quantity, l.name AS location_name FROM medications m JOIN medication_inventory mi ON m.id = mi.medication_id JOIN locations l ON mi.location = l.name
SELECT m.name, mb.batch_number, mb.expiration_date, l.address FROM medications m JOIN medication_batches mb ON m.id = mb.medication_id JOIN locations l ON l.id = 1
SELECT m.name, mi.quantity, l.address FROM medications m JOIN medication_inventory mi ON m.id = mi.medication_id JOIN locations l ON mi.location = l.name WHERE l.id = 2
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_medications FROM medications
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS average_quantity FROM medication_inventory
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM medication_inventory
SELECT l.name, COUNT(mi.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM locations l JOIN medication_inventory mi ON l.name = mi.location GROUP BY l.name
SELECT m.name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM medications m JOIN medication_inventory mi ON m.id = mi.medication_id GROUP BY m.name

SELECT mb.batch_number, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM medication_batches mb JOIN medication_inventory mi ON mb.medication_id = mi.medication_id GROUP BY mb.batch_number HAVING total_quantity > 100

SELECT m.name, mi.quantity, mb.batch_number, mb.expiration_date FROM medications m JOIN medication_inventory mi ON m.id = mi.medication_id JOIN medication_batches mb ON m.id = mb.medication_id WHERE mi.quantity > 5 AND mb.expiration_date > '2023-06-30'
SELECT l.name AS location_name, COUNT(mi.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM locations l LEFT JOIN medication_inventory mi ON l.name = mi.location GROUP BY l.name

SELECT m.name, mi.quantity, mb.expiration_date, l.address FROM medications m JOIN medication_inventory mi ON m.id = mi.medication_id JOIN medication_batches mb ON m.id = mb.medication_id JOIN locations l ON l.id = 3

SELECT * FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_name LIKE 'P%'
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medications JOIN inventory ON medications.medication_id = inventory.medication_id WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 AND batch_number LIKE 'B%'
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM manufacturers WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'California'
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 20 ORDER BY batch_number DESC
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN medications ON orders.medication_id = medications.medication_id WHERE quantity > 5
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin'
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM manufacturers JOIN medications ON manufacturers.manufacturer_id = medications.medication_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name
SELECT medication_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM medications JOIN orders ON medications.medication_id = orders.medication_id GROUP BY medication_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%test%'
SELECT manufacturer_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM manufacturers JOIN inventory ON manufacturers.manufacturer_id = inventory.medication_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name
SELECT * FROM medications M1 JOIN medications M2 ON M1.medication_id = M2.medication_id WHERE M1.expiration_date < M2.expiration_date
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM manufacturers JOIN medications ON manufacturers.manufacturer_id = medications.medication_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role IN ('Admin', 'Manager')
SELECT medication_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY medication_id
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC
